#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
const LL MOD = 274877906944LL;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		LL A, D, N, X;
		cin >> A >> D >> N >> X;
		LL ans = 0;
		for(int i = 0;i <= N;++i){
			ans = ((ans*X)%MOD + (A + D*i)%MOD)%MOD;
		}
		cout << ans << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
